mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO at_pur_ret_line ( FID, FEntryID, FMaterialID, FMaterialNumber, FMaterialName, FMaterialTypeNumber, FMaterialTypeName, FUnit, FQty, FBatch, FStockID, FStockNumber, FStockName, FRate, FTaxPrice, FAllAmount, FNote ) VALUES
( #{item.FID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FEntryID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FMaterialID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FMaterialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FMaterialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FMaterialTypeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FMaterialTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FQty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FStockID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FStockNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FStockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.FRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.FTaxPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.FAllAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.FNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE FEntryID = VALUES(FEntryID)
